feed.title: FMyLife
feed.subtitle: My life sucks but I don't give a fuck

entry.title: Anonymous says FML
entry.content: Today, I found out that my resume contained the word "masturbation" in the skills section, courtesy of a practical joke by my best friend. I have been using this CV unsuccessfully for over two months. FML

entry.title: Anonymous says FML
entry.content: Today, while I was looking for an apartment for my boyfriend and myself, he asked me how would I feel about his mom moving in together with us. FML

entry.title: Rynne S. says FML
entry.content: Today, I got my yearbook. My sister and I are identical twins, and we realized only my sister had a picture in it. When we asked the head of yearbook, they said they thought it was the same girl trying to get two pictures, so they put in the prettier one. FML

entry.title: Wow says FML
entry.content: Today, I realized that I am so sexually deprived that I get aroused when plugging my headphones into my computer. FML

entry.title: pagvscgrac says FML
entry.content: Today, I got a hand cramp from popping zits on my face. FML

entry.title: sandi519 says FML
entry.content: Today, I was working retail when a group of older gentlemen came in looking for a good sound system. I showed them a top-range system and gushed about it in detail, trying to close the sale. One of them snorted and said, "See Dave, girls like her are the reason ball gags were invented." FML

entry.title: Anonymous says FML
entry.content: Today, my grandparents visited. My grandpa kept getting off the couch and walking around to "stretch his legs." He kept kicking out my computer's network cable and messing up my game, smirking each time he did it. When I complained, my mom told me to shut up and show some respect. FML

entry.title: anonamous says FML
entry.content: Today, I hugged my dog and kissed her on the side of the face. She responded by mauling me across my own face. FML

entry.title: bowser_rawr16 says FML
entry.content: Today, I realized how poor I am when I had to use sharpies to color in the worn spots on my dress shoes before leaving for work. FML

entry.title: dumbfriend says FML
entry.content: Today, I was talking to a group of friends about the various problems in Africa. One of them interrupts me and asks with a straight face, "If it's so bad over there, why don't they all just leave?" FML

entry.title: Anonymous says FML
entry.content: Today, I still have the bronchitis and the stomach flu that I suffered through all weekend. Today was to be the day I had my bachelorette party and wedding shower. I had to call both of them off. FML

entry.title: yamsterr says FML
entry.content: Today, my girlfriend and I agreed to tell her parents that she's pregnant. When they started freaking out, instead of dealing with the situation maturely, she went into straight-up Tard Mode and said, "It's okay, I'm not the mom." FML

entry.title: gengiskarn69 says FML
entry.content: Today, I thought it would be funny to sneak up on my dad while he was rummaging through his briefcase. He must have heard me, because the moment I got up close, he whirled around and yelled "BOO!" causing me to scream like a little bitch. FML

entry.title: Tristansefam1367 says FML
entry.content: Today, I was shopping for tampons when a cute guy came over and gave me his number. He said, "Call me in 3 to 5 days." FML

entry.title: anonymous says FML
entry.content: Today, I burned my butt on the heater when I tried to warm up after my shower. FML

entry.title: titillating says FML
entry.content: Today, on my way to work, I had to squeeze by a man sitting in a large truck parked next to my car. I was in a bit of a hurry and in my rush the collar of my shirt got caught on his grill. My shirt ripped and I flashed the guy my entire boob. FML

entry.title: Anonymous says FML
entry.content: Today, I was shaving naked in my cold bathroom before showering. My wife walked up behind me, yelled "Shrinkage!" and flicked the head of my penis as hard as she could. FML

entry.title: weep weep weep says FML
entry.content: Today, after months of teaching my parrot to speak, he finally demonstrated his abilities. I accidentally set off my smoke detector, and he's been wailing like a dying banshee ever since. FML

entry.title: me says FML
entry.content: Today, a guy came by my house and demanded my fiancé come out and fight. He explained that my fiancé had been stupid enough to not only troll on a local interest forum, but to leave his name and our address, inviting people to "come shut me up if you think you're tough enough." FML

entry.title: SakuraFubuki92 says FML
entry.content: Today, I moved out of my apartment by the highway and airport, and into a new place below people who blast loud music, stomp their feet, and slam doors throughout the night. I haven't had a decent night's sleep in over a year. FML

entry.title: Anonymous says FML
entry.content: Today, I watched Gigli. FML

entry.title: daninalani says FML
entry.content: Today, I was discussing the possibility of other life in the universe with my friend. She said the universe isn't big enough for it to be possible, and that we would know about it already, because "there are only 8 planets in the universe." FML

entry.title: aprilmay91 says FML
entry.content: Today, at work at a gas station kiosk, a man requested a carton of cigarettes. We keep our cigarettes on a high shelf. I'm short and very large chested so I have to jump in order to reach the carton. He said, "I only come here for the entertainment" and left without purchasing his cigarettes. FML

entry.title: AkGirl1991 says FML
entry.content: Today, I was opening a present my boyfriend got me for my 21st birthday. What I unwrapped was a Kay jewelers box. Excited, I opened it to find a ring made out of a one dollar bill. FML

entry.title: meganisabella says FML
entry.content: Today, I went driving for the first time. I made it twenty miles to my step mom's house, and didn't stop until I was inside the garage. Too bad the garage door was closed when I got there. FML

entry.title: Tristan Brantley says FML
entry.content: Today, I called my wife from work to check in on her because she's eight months pregnant. She didn't answer. Instead she showed up at my work hysterically crying and screaming, "You don't love me because I'm a fat whale!" She then knocked everything off my desk. FML

entry.title: Joey says FML
entry.content: Today, while DJing at a jumpin' wedding reception, my speaker system conked out. I hadn't brought any backup equipment, and 500 guests had the unfortunate luxury of dancing to the sounds of a portable CD player someone brought in from their car. FML

entry.title: The Last One says FML
entry.content: Today, in the locker room at work, someone tried writing "douche bag" on my locker, and misspelled it four times before apparently giving up. FML

entry.title: jmac says FML
entry.content: Today, I dropped a knife while cooking. Luckily it missed my foot, but only because it hit my knee. FML

entry.title: Major3 says FML
entry.content: Today, I became a father. Unfortunately, my wife found out. FML

entry.title: Jimii Liu says FML
entry.content: Today, I had a date with a woman. She brought her dog along. Every time when I touched her, the jealous male dog began to bark and tried to bite me. FML

entry.title: whyme says FML
entry.content: Today, my mother screamed and swore at me because I said I was looking to move out soon. Apparently, the idea of me moving out at 27 and her getting a job to pay her own way is devastating. FML

entry.title: Alison says FML
entry.content: Today, I found out I've miserably failed a college exam. My friend had agreed to pass me answers if I needed them, since I've hardly studied this year. We were on the phone when she said, "Oh, those answers were bullshit. Serves you right, huh?" FML

entry.title: callen5 says FML
entry.content: Today, I was talking to my girlfriend over Skype. I said I loved her and hoped we would be together forever. She responded by singing Who Wants to Live Forever into her mic. FML

entry.title: Anonymous says FML
entry.content: Today, I was re-watching my wedding video. As I was walking down the aisle, you could hear my grandfather mutter "Here comes the bride, all fat and wide." FML
